content: shop special offer - 4 for 3 on all crochet & knitting patterns click here to see all my patterns just add 4 patterns to your cart before checkout 1 »»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» * small pumpkin knitting pattern worked up flat* pattern is available on my blog here 2 you would need to know how to do the following knitting stitches click on the stitch for a video knit purl make 1 3 pumpkin is made up flat materials * scheepjes catona 2 x 10g balls of rich coral #410 1 x 10g ball of caramel #506 * 3mm knitting needles us 2 5 uk11 * tapestry needles * toy stuffing you can buy all supplies from wool warehouse click here 4 finished pumpkin size 3 5 x 1 5 inches 9cm x 4cm pumpkin knitting pattern is copyrighted to peach unicorn designs but permission is granted for any finished blankets to be sold with the condition that the pattern is credited back to peach unicorn designs 1 http //www ravelry com/stores/peach-unicorn-designs 2 https //peachunicorndesigns com/blogs/knitting-blog/free-pumpkin-knitting-pattern 3 https //peachunicorndesigns com/pages/knitting-videos 4 https //shrsl com/2j2h0
